entries.yarrock_downer: The mind enhance effects of the Yarrock dissipate leaving you with a splitting headache.
entries.yarrock_done: The headache from the Yarrock seems to have gone.
entries.yarrock_consume: Lights flash before your eyes as the Yarrock expands your mind.
entries.thruster_head_downer: The mind enhancement of the Thruster Head leaves you wracked with nausea.
entries.thruster_head_done: The intense nausea seems to have left.
entries.thruster_head_consume: You feel a rush of mental awareness and a massive increase in your mental capabilities.
entries.sys_already_spiced: You are already under the influence of spice.
entries.sweetblossom_downer: As the anaesthetic Sweetblossom fades, your wounds suddenly feel sharply more painful.
entries.sweetblossom_done: The effects of the Sweetblossom have left your system.
entries.sweetblossom_consume: Aches and pains leave your body as the Sweetblossom takes effect.
entries.shadowpaw_downer: Your reaction speed has slowed considerably.
entries.shadowpaw_done: The decrease in your reaction speed seems to have passed.
entries.shadowpaw_consume: You feel an increase in your reaction speed.
entries.sedative_h4b_downer: The effects of the sedative fade leaving you intensely sensitive to wounds.
entries.sedative_h4b_consume: As you inject the sedative, your sense of feeling deadens.
entries.scramjet_downer: The strength enhancing effects of the Scramjet pass, leaving you feeling weakened.
entries.scramjet_consume: Your muscles burst with new strength as you consume the Scramjet.
entries.pyrepenol_downer: Your stength enhancement fades, leaving your muscles sore and weak.
entries.pyrepenol_done: The aches in your muscles have ended.
entries.pyrepenol_consume: As you swallow the pyrepenol, you suddenly feel your muscles surge with strength.
entries.neutron_pixey_downer: The mind enhancing effects of the Neutron Pixie leave.  You have to fight to retain consciousness.
entries.neutron_pixey_done: The negative effects of the Neutron Pixie seem to have left your body.
entries.neutron_pixey_consume: As you consume the Neutron Pixie you begin to feel light headed.
entries.muon_gold_downer: The Muon Gold fades, leaves your mind feeling weak and slow.
entries.muon_gold_done: The negative effects of the Muon Gold seem to have passed.
entries.muon_gold_consume: The Muon Gold irradiates your body increasing your mental clarity and focus.
entries.kwi_boost_downer: You feel cold and begin to shake as the adrenalin dissipates.
entries.kwi_boost_consume: Your body tingles as the adrenalin courses through your veins.
entries.kliknik_boost_downer: You weaken as your inner armor begins to dissolve.
entries.kliknik_boost_done: The weakness passes as your body completes its cleansing.
entries.gunjack_downer: The Gunjack's effects dissipate leaving you feeling weak and sluggish.
entries.gunjack_done: The sluggishness induced by the Gunjack seems to be gone.
entries.gunjack_consume: The Gunjack burns in your throat.  You feel an intense rush of physical strength.
entries.grey_gabaki_downer: The focusing effects of the Grey Gabaki have left you feeling drowsy.
entries.grey_gabaki_done: The drowsy feeling of the Grey Gabaki has passed.
entries.grey_gabaki_consume: The Grey Gabaki fills you with a sharp sense of focus.
entries.giggledust_downer: The sense of euphoria from the Giggledust fades, leaving you feeling depressed.
entries.giggledust_done: The depression of the absense of Giggledust has faded.
entries.giggledust_consume: You feel light headed and filled with euphoria.
entries.droid_lube_downer: The zypolene's effects fade, leaving you feeling vulnerable.
entries.droid_lube_done: The zypolene induced vulnerability has ended.
entries.droid_lube_consume: The zypolene burns as you apply it, causing you to feel more resiliant.
entries.crash_n_burn_downer: The awareness enhancing effects of the Crash n' Burn fade, but the feeling of apathy intensifies.
entries.crash_n_burn_done: The feeling of apathy from the Crash n' Burn leaves you.
entries.crash_n_burn_consume: You become intensely aware of your surroundings and filled with a sense of apathy.
entries.booster_blue_downer: Your reaction time slows considerably as the Booster Blue's effects fade.
entries.booster_blue_done: Your reaction time returns to normal as your body adjusts to the lack of Booster Blue.
entries.booster_blue_consume: You consume the Booster Blue and feel a boost to your physical speed.
entries.bio_kwi_adrenal_boost_downer: You feel cold and begin to shake as the adrenalin dissipates.
entries.bio_kwi_adrenal_boost_consume: Your body tingles as the adrenalin courses through your veins.
entries.bio_kliknik_fortitude_boost_downer: You weaken as your inner armor begins to dissolve.
entries.bio_kliknik_fortitude_boost_done: The weakness passes as your body completes its cleansing.
